import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../../models/Product'; import { Purchase } from '../../models/Purchase'; import { Sale } from '../../models/Sale'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent { model: Product; constructor() { this.model = { name: '', description: '', quantity: 0, price: 0, productId: 0, purchases: [], sales: [] }; } onFormSubmit() { console.log(this.model) } }

Add Product
